name: Even the Stars
description:
wandering through space without a purpose_getting old and getting lost_

a game by Pol Clarissou with musics by Nicholas Gavan
first version realized during the space cowboy game jam

share your endgame maps under the #eventhestarsgame hashtag

Online (unity web player) version of the game playable for free on the official page

Builds last updated 21·03·2015

The original prototype of the game made in ~2 weeks for the Space Cowboy game jam can be found here.
